text: kharekhara a to eka nama che, je tame ane tamara bapa-dada'o'e (nama) rakhi lidha che. Allaha ta'ala'e te'ona ko'i purava nathi utaraya, a loko to phakata atakalo upara potani manacahata pachala padela che ane kharekhara temana palanahara taraphathi temani pase satya margadarsana avi pahoncyum che
